name: GRoll
description:
---Created for the GMTK Gamejam---

In GRoll, you grow the dice you use to get points. There is a variety of dice available at your disposal, with procedural plants and different viable stratagies.

Music by Stereochrome - https://soundcloud.com/strchrm

Due to issues, after spending 5 hours (no exaggeration) trying to get a windows build, i could not do it.
